participant_1.background:
I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play.
I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
i am allergic to shellfish.
My time is my most valuable possession.
I took a spin in my Toyota Land Cruiser before heading to my favorite dance club to celebrate my birthday.

participant_2.background:
I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
if things are not done right i will redo them again and again.
i sleep most of the day.
I spend my free time fixing up junk cars and making YouTube videos about it.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just got done editing a video for my YouTube channel.
Nice! What kind of videos do you make?
I make videos about fixing up junk cars.
Oh, that sounds interesting!
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I like working with my hands and I'm always learning new things.
I'm not much of a handyman, but I can appreciate a good fixer-upper.
Haha, well it's not as hard as it looks. If you have the right tools and a little patience, you can do anything.
I'm sure I could learn. Maybe I'll give it a try one day.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to save money.
Yeah, I've heard that. Maybe I'll start by watching your videos.
That's a great idea! I'll be sure to give you some tips.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
No problem!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my pug. She's my best friend.
Aww, I love pugs! They're so cute.
Yeah, they are. She's the best dog I've ever had.
I'm sure she is.
She's my little shadow. She follows me everywhere I go.
Haha, I bet she does.
Yeah, she's pretty attached to me.
I can see why. She sounds like a great dog.
She is. I'm so lucky to have her in my life.
I'm sure she's lucky to have you too
